TopicTitle: RIght-Click Right Shift does not work - Need to transfer fuel between tanks!

Articles.Content: So nothing works ive tried alt clicks control clicks shift clicks all in 100 combinations and no fuel transfer window will show up. Is Linux just this bad of an expierence? Is there a way to hack a setting in the .cfg file to force the key cobmos to work?

Some more information is going to be needed to properly diagnose this.

Specifically your KSP.log, what mods you have installed and your player.log. Details are in the thread I linked for how to find these things and get them up here.

Cheers,

ToTheMun

hah, not even close ! But nice try....the fix is this.........go to your settings.cfg file located in the main KSP directory and look for this line of code :

MODIFIER_KEY

{

primary = RightShift

secondary = None

group = 0

switchState = Any

}

Originally it was set to ALT , so the above code is the correct code.

The Linux version is supposed to use right shift for the modifier key, so why yours was set to alt is a bit of a mystery. Did you change it yourself at some point or maybe copy the settings.cfg from a Windows install?
yea it was copied from the windows install , ahh the migration terrors
